players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "I believe we need to focus our efforts on finding the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's crucial that we work together and share any suspicions or concerns we may have."
You: "I agree with Diana. We should all be vigilant and share any information we have to help identify the mafia among us."
Charlie: "I think we should keep an open mind and not jump to conclusions based on one event. Let's give the new day a chance and focus on building trust within our group."

You: "I'd like to propose that we all share any information or observations we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. We need to work together and build trust in order to identify the mafia among us and keep our group safe."

Charlie: "I understand your concerns, but let's not accuse each other based on assumptions. We should focus on building trust and sharing information to help us identify the mafia among us. Let's give everyone the benefit of the doubt and work together as a team."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we continue to communicate openly and share any information or suspicions we may have. Given the events of last night, it's crucial that we work together to identify the mafia among us and keep our group safe."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
